TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kanao’pu, title = Kanao’pu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanao’pu} }

S.FORM: Kanao'pu Itiniay i Luye Cen no Taitung ko Kanao'pu a niyaro', 363 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 884 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 28% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 244 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 72% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 640 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 24%, Bunun 1%, roma 2%.

Kanao'po Itiniay i Loye Cen no Taitong ko Kanao'po a niyaro', 363 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 884 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 28% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 244 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 72% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 640 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 24%, Bonon 1%, roma 2%.
